Art & Layout by Andrew McGranahan

name: JACOB TURNBLOOM'S DEATH TAPE
description: LIMITED DEATH TAPE CASSETTE FROM MRS. MAGICIAN'S JACOB TURNBLOOM SIDE A Monsters on Maple Street // Do You Wanna Walk Around In The Dark // Cheat Death // Your Soul Can Be Sold // Death On Every Corner // Photo Copied Love // Sleep Running // Rod Luck On His Life Boat To Paradise // Postcard My Parents Sent // An Officer & A Gentleman // Pain & Suffering // Everything Dies // Someday, Someone // Let's Go To Hell // I Hate Loving You SIDE B Lazy Girl // DJ Anarcho Fight Punx // Peace, Love & Understanding // The Front Steps // Goodbye Pain & Old Memories // God Only Knows // I Fell Asleep // Small Dreams // I'm Here To Get My Baby Out Of Jail // The Great Indoors // Eyes All Over Town // Wai Ki Kill // Everything Dies (Reprise) // Why Kiki? // Arrested LIMITED RELEASE 100 CASSETTES GR016 5/15/12 All songs written by Jacob Turnbloom except 21 & 24 by the Beach Boys and Karl Davis & Harty Taylor (respectively) Performed by Jacob Turnbloom Recorded by Jacob Turnbloom in his bedroom in San Diego, CA expect for "Your Soul Can Be Sold" recorded by Brad Lee @SDRL
